```{r,echo=F}
Tablas_anchas<-function(x){
  x%>%
    kable(booktabs = TRUE,format = "latex") %>%
    kable_styling(
    latex_options = c("striped", "condensed", "scale_down","HOLD_position"),
    position = "center",
    full_width = FALSE)
}
Tablas<-function(x){
  x%>%
    kable(booktabs = TRUE,format = "latex") %>%
    kable_styling(
    latex_options = c("striped", "condensed","HOLD_position"),
    position = "center",
    full_width = FALSE)
}

```
